questions.text: Which business model focuses on selling outcomes or results rather than physical products?
A jet engine manufacturer charging airlines per hour of flight time instead of selling the engine outright is an example of:
What is the key enabler for Product-as-a-Service models in the industrial sector?
options: IIoT and the ability to monitor asset performance in real-time
questions.correctAnswer: IIoT and the ability to monitor asset performance in real-time

questions.text: What is a major benefit for the customer in a PaaS model?
options: They shift from a large capital expenditure (CapEx) to a more predictable operating expenditure (OpEx)
They are responsible for all maintenance and repairs
The product is guaranteed to never fail
questions.correctAnswer: They shift from a large capital expenditure (CapEx) to a more predictable operating expenditure (OpEx)

questions.text: For the provider, a key advantage of the PaaS model is:
options: They have no ongoing relationship with the customer
It creates a recurring revenue stream and a long-term customer relationship
questions.correctAnswer: It creates a recurring revenue stream and a long-term customer relationship

questions.text: What is the 'platform economy' in the context of IIoT?
options: An economy based on selling physical platforms
Digital platforms that connect different groups of users (e.g., manufacturers, service providers, customers)
An economic theory from the 18th century
questions.correctAnswer: Digital platforms that connect different groups of users (e.g., manufacturers, service providers, customers)

questions.text: Siemens' MindSphere and GE's Predix are examples of:
The 'gig economy' model, when applied to manufacturing, might look like:
options: Hiring only full-time, permanent factory workers
A platform that connects businesses needing parts made with manufacturers who have spare production capacity
questions.correctAnswer: A platform that connects businesses needing parts made with manufacturers who have spare production capacity

questions.text: A significant challenge in transitioning to a PaaS business model is:
options: The technology is not advanced enough
The need for a cultural shift in the organization and managing financial risk during the transition
It is impossible to track product usage
questions.correctAnswer: The need for a cultural shift in the organization and managing financial risk during the transition

questions.text: Data monetization in IIoT refers to:
options: Selling raw sensor data to the highest bidder without any privacy concerns
Using collected data to improve efficiency, create new services, or generate revenue
Deleting all collected data to save storage costs
Printing out all data on paper
questions.correctAnswer: Using collected data to improve efficiency, create new services, or generate revenue
